cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Cooling begins with 1 and ends
with 2.
cards.answer:
1. injection
2. demolding

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When does the shrinkage of the polymer occur?
cards.answer: During cooling down.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which point during the injection phase is of high importance and what happens if
the timing isn't right?
cards.answer:
Switching point from
compression to holding
pressure
When switching too early -> volume of the part is too low -> sink
marks are visible on surface

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When is the injection phase finished?
cards.answer: When the gate freezes.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the 3 phases of the injection stage and marked point at the end of the
curve.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_09.13.16.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T174659Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=796fff04d49b55d817665ae8e38cc6ea9561ae308a7dd0b1aac67e0272508b55

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 stages of the melt flow.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_09.06.23.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T174659Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=afc83083bd995cc4a05e8b68274db4b91383359f2aab8cbe44f78565849ff654

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens during the injection?
cards.answer:
Screw moves forward without rotating
injection of the metered material through the nozzle into the mold

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What has to be adjusted for each new molding process?
cards.answer: Back pressure and metering stroke

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What defines the metering volume and how is it called?
cards.answer:
Screw position / screw backward travel
Name: Feeding / metering stroke

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How does back pressure affect the melt?
cards.answer:
Better homogenization
Improved dissipation heating

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What causes the back pressure during metering?
cards.answer: Conglomerated melt at screw tip.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why does the screw move backward during metering?
cards.answer:
Melt accumulates at screw tip
pressure builds up

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens to the material in the plasticizing cylinder during
metering?
cards.answer:
It gets
conveyed
densified
melted

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 7 steps of the Injection Molding Process.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-09_um_08.51.15.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T174659Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=929b5654ba2f309a5770145c4b93d8fbf028abc923615581be347ec15d6836ab

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: When and why is cooling of the mold helpful?
cards.answer:
For molding parts with complicated geometry, different cooling rates can avoid
warpage of the whole part.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What mediums are chosen as a cooling fluid in mold plates?
cards.answer: water or oil

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is important if you use more than one cavity in a runner system?
cards.answer:
Each cavity has to fill at the same time
Melt has to have the same pressure and temperature when entering cavity

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How can you improve the efficiency of an injection mold process and how is it
achieved?
cards.answer:
By using more than one cavity per mold
Main runner channel coming from the nozzle splits into several channels

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the price range for an injection molding tool?

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What tasks do the elements of a mold fulfill?
cards.answer:
• Melt intake and spreading
• Drawing of the pattern
• Quenching of the melt
• Demolding

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 4 elements a mold generally consists of.
cards.answer:
• Plate with cavity
• Runner system
• Heating system
• Ejector system

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which distance on a machine limits the size of a mold?
cards.answer: The distance between the adjacent tie bars.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name at least 3 advantages of a fully electric clamping unit.
cards.answer:
• Higher precision due to fast reaction times of the electro-mechanical
drives
• Energy saving by higher efficiency
• Low maintenance of electro-mechanical drives
• High reproducibility by direct mechanical connection of motors and axes
• Higher output due to parallel operation mode
• No use of hydraulic oil results in cleaner production

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an advantage/disadvantage of hydraulic clamping units?
cards.answer:
advantage:
no tie bar breakage
cost-saving design due to fewer flexible parts and less maintenance
higher precision
variable positioning
no unacceptable mold deformation
disadvantages:
Slower clamping speed
Oil compression → lower stiffness
High energy demand
Oil leakage risk
Higher system complexity (hydraulics)

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an advantage/disadvantage of toggle clamping units?
cards.answer:
advantage:
self locking -> no energy requirement to keep the mold closed
disadvantage:
permanent deformation of the mold after poor adjustment of the toggle and the
high maintenance due to many moving parts

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
For which machine sizes are hydraulically driven toggles (Kniehebel) normally
used?
cards.answer: smaller and medium sized machines

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 common clamping systems.
cards.answer:
• Toggle Clamping unit (electrically or hydraulically driven)
• Fully hydraulic clamping unit or
• Fully electrical clamping unit

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which component holds back the injected polymer?
cards.answer: Non-return valve

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How does the plasticizing take place in the screw?
cards.answer: by internal friction and heat supply by heating tapes

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the 3 sections of a common injection molding screw.
cards.answer:
• Feed section
• Compression section
• Metering section

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are the most important elements of the plasticizing unit to realize the
tasks?
cards.answer:
• Hopper
• Screw in heated barrel
• Drive system
• Non-return valve
• Nozzle

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name at least 3 main procedural tasks performed by the plasticizing unit.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.05.35.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181121Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=4700bdac75113816658b8d43fc3c100c2f5c8f46b98cc3a5a952e61067fed9e7

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name the parts that make up an Injection Molding Machine.
cards.answer:
Injection molding machines consist of following component assemblies:
• Plasticizing unit
• Clamping unit
• Measurement and control unit
• Machine bed
• Mold
• Temperature control for the mold
Mold and temperature control do not belong directly to the machine setup.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.04.54.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181121Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=5ae3a9f8deb475685b97d3abeffb2c6f8a9c8b754792dd5488c44231e24914e2

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How is the task for a Injection Molding Machine defined?
cards.answer:
Discontinuous production of molding from primarily macromolecular substances,
whereas primary shaping is performed under pressure.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Name at least 3 characteristics of injection molding.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_17.02.07.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181121Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=f65eb28c5d2afaee718cbdf9ed1c51d4c35b4bf9d610c5693f3f5619bb6cadff

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: How is the mathematical connection between cycle and cooling time?
cards.answer:
The cooling time (tcool) increases proportionally with the wall
thickness (dwall) in second power.
tcool = C •
dwall2
C: Proportionality constant depending on
material and process conditions

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What measurement is crucial for productivity and on which part of the process
does it depend on?
cards.answer: The cycle time; depends particularly on the cooling time

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.58.52.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=4e16a60f919d6e5b6130c0dc69e274fe98fa5cb0a9e36764fb04207ea48db883
cards.answer:
The ejectors demold the frozen part from the open mold
the screw conveys new material to the screw tip
the injection unit moves backward

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.58.22.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=eb2d3046ceb3ae258660beefbcefca63c4a5c395408dd54e52cf3add4585cf74
cards.answer:
The mold closes
the injection unit moves forward to the sprue bush
the screw presses the molten polymer like a piston into the mold
➡️Injection

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens in this step?
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.57.58.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=dd27e9d4321d565a2e5b9c6ddb41f8569d76fe1cfc29a309e7d697366ce14ccd
cards.answer:
The rotating screw conveys the granulate from the feed hopper through the
screw channels to the screw tip

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are the 3 main steps of the process?
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-07_um_16.57.36.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=9f9ba3acd79084f3838a1dfc71463ccea78a9f643abf3da39be96c6e4a04543d

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are 2 main advantages of Injection Molding?
cards.answer:
minor further treatment of parts
ability to produce parts with complex geometry

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the weight ratio of parts that can be produced?
cards.answer: less than 1mg to more than 100kg

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How high is the percentage of injection molding machines of all produced
plastics and why?
cards.answer:
about 60%
Injection Molding is a very important processing strategy for thermoplastics

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name at least 4 criteria for a mold
design.
cards.answer:
Component design suitable for plastics
Determination of the plastic type
Determination of the mold design:
Number of cavities
Injection points
Shrinkage
Definition of the melt distribution system:
Cold runner
Hot runner
Venting of the cavities
Ejection of the component from the cavity
Cooling/tempering (circuits/ cooling holes)
Thermal expansion of the mold

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why does a mold need to be heated?
cards.answer: Depending on the used material the crystallization temperature is so high (160°C)

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the components of an injection mold.
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.12.13.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=1e4ba2eadad1b02c5ea5a5c5ce142c79ca7914a8ba4a93cc9fe0e15033d4b5cb
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.12.40.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=7943bd533fd97be5913a6d744f33d720faa867fc610800f0c92b85ff49d9407d

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which two halves form the cavity?
cards.answer:
Female mold half = cavity
Male mold half = core.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is an injection mold, and what is its purpose?
cards.answer:
Mold with one/more cavities
shape of desired product
produces plastic parts in large numbers, required quality, dimensional
accuracy, low cost.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are the 3 main nozzle designs and which one is
the standard?
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_17.05.11.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181123Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=4e718cbbf197d6188d380df865e3121dee1ab0b6d9ea416ee8399692571e8d26

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the purpose of plasticizing unit nozzle?
cards.answer:
• The nozzle connects the injection unit to the
injection mold.
• The nozzle reduces the screw diameter to a few
millimeters

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens to the lock ring during injection?
cards.answer:
lock ring is pressed against pressure ring
screw flights are closed -> no backflow

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What happens to the lock ring during metering?
cards.answer:
It is ressed against screw tip during metering
creates gap between the lock ring and pressure ring
melt flows through gap

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What do lock ring and pressure ring do together with the screw tip?
cards.answer: Act as a stop for the melt

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which three parts make up the non‑return valve?
cards.answer:
Screw tip
lock ring
pressure ring

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Where is the non‑return valve located?
cards.answer: At the tip of the metering screw.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is the main function of the non‑return valve?
cards.answer: Prevent melt backflow; the screw acts as a piston.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the 3 zones of an universal
screw and describe their
task.
cards.answer:
feed zone: rear end of the screw with the greatest flight
depth, used for conveying
compression zone: transition from the feed zone to the
discharge zone with increasing core thickness and decreasing flight depth,
also transition zone
discharge zone / metering: front part of the screw with the
lowest flight depth, also discharge or metering zone

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are disadvantages of a screw unit?
cards.answer:
Effective screw length is shortened during plasticizing (limited metering
stroke, inhomogeneous T-distribution)
Non-return valves (NRV) are required

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are advantages of a screw unit?
cards.answer:
Less installation space required
Short residence time
Screw serves two functions
plasticizing (rotation)
Injection as piston

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What is a screw unit?
cards.answer: Screw or screw piston injection molding machine

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
In a preplasticizing + injection piston unit, how are
plasticizing and injection arranged and
which components perform each function?
cards.answer:
• Plasticizing and injection are spatially separated
• Plasticizing with a single-screw extruder
• Injection via an injection piston

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name disadvantages of a preplasticizing +
injection piston system in injection molding.
cards.answer:
• High construction effort
• Valves susceptible to maintenance
• High manufacturing costs

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What are advantages of a preplasticizing + injection
piston system in injection molding?
cards.answer:
• Consistent plasticizing quality
• High injection speeds

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Define Sealing Point.
cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.51.24.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181124Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=bfdbb45bd55cdd391586c2949c22f2d013b4430309d2a12065bbd9b835dafc8c

cards.answer: [Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_14.47.19.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181124Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=bc1afa4b33a72abf31422627aef1b6be3f28a80c67e4fb81d84b0ab105f40cef

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What is the task of the Plasticizing Unit and how is it
classified?
cards.answer:
It injects the melt into the closed mold at high speed and, respectively,
high pressure
classified according to its injection performance, which is calculated from
injection volume multiplied by max. injection pressure.

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which components does the Plasticizing-Unit comprise and what
are their tasks?
cards.answer:
Components:
heated barrel
screw drive
hydraulics for moving the screw
Tasks:
plasticizing of the injection material
metering of the compound
the application of injection and
holding pressure

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name advantages/disadvantages of a tie-bar-less closing
unit.
cards.answer:
disadvantage: very stiff (-> thick) plates are needed to
counteract missing tie bars

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name advantage/disadvantage of a closing unit with Knee
Lever
cards.answer:
+ no constant hydraulic
pressure: unit is closed purely mechanically →
energy efficient
- more moving parts for
mechanism

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: What are the requirements of a Closing Unit?
cards.answer:
must accommodate the injection mold
enable closing / opening movement of the mold halves
apply the closing and clamping force

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Which components are a part of the Closing Unit?
cards.answer:
fixed and moving plate for the mold
the face plate (rear bearing of the closing unit)
tie bars
drive of the moving mold plate
[Image] https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/studysmarter-mediafiles/media/1168528/flashcard_images/Bildschirmfoto_2026-01-06_um_13.31.44.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA4OLDUDE42UZHAIET%2F20260223%2Feu-central-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20260223T181137Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=8d0cf10e78ca733d6c2394f81e9e141d1cf0de297632f3dccb1a0df57dc6e4c5

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question: Why is the cooling time in the process relatively long?
cards.answer:
high heat capacity of plastic
low thermal conductivity → takes long until heat gets out of part

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which steps (number and name) of the Injection Molding Cycle are for cooling the
molding part?
cards.answer:
4. Pack & hold
5. Screw backward
6. Melt plasticizing

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How many steps does the Injection Molding
Process consist off and what are there names?
cards.answer:
Mold close
Screw forward
Injection
Pack & hold
Screw backward
Melt plasticizing
Mold open, ejection

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What is a goal that you aim for regarding the wall
thickness of a Injection Molding part and why is
that?
cards.answer:
Uniform wall thickness for one part to avoid different
cooling times (thicker - longer | thinner - short) which would lead to
internal stresses
warpage
sink marks
uneven flow resistance → incomplete filling, weld lines, quality
variations

cards.question:
What is the pressure range in the injection molding
process?

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Name the 5 parts that make up a Injection Molding
Machine.
cards.answer:
Closing unit
Injection mold
Electronic control system
Injection molding unit
Machine table

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
Which process is used when there is a high number of parts that need to be
produced?
cards.answer: Injection Molding

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
What happens after the melt has cooled (solidified)? What
general rule is "written" for injection molding parts?
cards.answer:
• after melt has cooled, molded part is demolded
• Rule: Injection molding is used to produce
thin-walled molded parts

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
How and where is the granulate processed and how is then the melt further
handled?
cards.answer:
• Granulate is melted (plasticized) in the heated barrel by screw rotation
• Melt/Injection Mass is injected at high speed under
pressure into cavity of the mold

cards.subject: Polymer Technologie
cards.question:
In which weight range is Injection Molding the most important process for
producing molded parts from plastic and which plastics are meant?
cards.answer:
• thermoplastics and thermosets
• a few milligrams to over 100 kg
